entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 4:34AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf Along The Coast Today Through Friday... Elevated surf and erosion is possible along the coast from the Colville River to Kaktovik through Friday. Southwesterly winds to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph this morning will shift to the west by this afternoon. As the wind shifts, this may cause waves to crash high up the beach.
